name: North Vietnam Motorbike Tour To Mai Chau
description: Situated 165 km to northwest of Hanoi, Mai Chau has recently been recognized as one of the favorite hill tribe tourist attractions in Vietnam, where Motorbike riders can surely discover the remnants of thousand years’ maternal society that can be seen through their Muong ethnic Gong festival, Thai people charming dancing and folk songs. This Vietnam motorcycle tours can not be any better chance to help you indulge yourself in splendid landscape such as terraced rice fields, local tropical forests, and especially high windy, snaky passes which witness the destined marriages between clouds and earth.
